The Event Horizon

This is my first attempt at recreating a ship from the movies. Sadly you have to cheat it into the position where it should be, as I can't create a stock drive that creates a black hole.

It is also not 100% accurate, as I said, this is my first attempt, but I feel that it retains the look and feel of the ship it is based on. 
https://kerbalx.com/Andetch/Event-Horizon

The Event Horizon carries an experimental propulsion system that should allow her to travel between the stars in an instant. However, on her maiden voyage something went wrong and she just disappeared from radar, assumed lost. Then one day she reappeared, in a low Eeloo orbit. (Or even better, a Jool orbit with a PP within the atmosphere so it decays, but I took the pictures from Eeloo) 

Build your own Lewis and Clark, and get out to Eeloo to find out where she has been all these years!

For those who do not know the film, go and watch it - it is a MUST for all Sci-Fi lovers, or check the wiki https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Event_Horizon_(film)

EDIT: It should also be noted that it doesn't need all those engines - I just felt I should give it a high TWR. It actually goes quite well with just two of the engines, with nearly 4k dV.

Edited June 14, 2018 by Andetch
